tool_description: Crafts powerful speech endings that reinforce key messages, inspire action, and create lasting impressions on the audience.

speech_goals.description: Primary objectives the speech aims to achieve

key_messages.description: Main points to reinforce in the conclusion

desired_action.description: What you want the audience to do after the speech

conclusion_style.description: Ending approach: call-to-action, summary, challenge, vision, circular

emotional_tone.description: Final emotional impression: uplifting, urgent, thoughtful, determined

error_messages: Empty goals array: Provide at least one speech goal for conclusion planning
Vague desired action: Specify a clear, actionable next step for the audience
Invalid conclusion style: Must be one of [call-to-action, summary, challenge, vision, circular]
Invalid emotional tone: Must be one of [uplifting, urgent, thoughtful, determined]
Message-action disconnect: Desired action doesn't align with key messages
usage: Enter speech goals array, key messages, and desired audience action. Optionally select conclusion style and emotional tone for customized ending impact.

conclusion_options.description: Multiple conclusion approaches with different emphases

final_statement.description: Powerful closing line or call to action

reinforcement_strategy.description: How the conclusion reinforces main messages

memorable_elements.description: Components designed for lasting audience impact
